name: ROLL n' DIE
description:
In this game, you play as a guy who is a die. He just got scammed out of some cold hard cash, and now, he's angry. Like REALLY angry. So angry in fact, he started to use his own body as a means of altering reality and making those who wronged him feel the pain they utterly deserve. Roll. Kill. Grow in strength. This is where you ROLL N' DIE!

Controls:

WASD for movement
Mouse to aim
Left Click to Punch
Right Click to Roll. Rolling will land you on one of 6 sides, that will use one of your six abilities.

Once you pick up an item, the game will pause until you click one of your slots in the bottom left!
